about_the_game:
SlimeSlider is a puzzle game where you try to guide a blob to the exit portal in each level.
The catch? Once you start moving, you continue sliding until you hit something.
You will need to use boxes in order to help maneuver around obstacles.
Is a wall an obstacle or a way to stop yourself from sliding too far? Is the inability to stop a problem or a way to move fast?
Figure out the various mechanics and try to figure out how to use them to your advantage in many unique puzzles.

Play through the main worlds or try to complete all 250 challenging levels.
New mechanics and ideas are frequently added to keep it interesting.
Build complex contraptions out of the tools provided in some levels.
There is plenty of challenge to those who seek it out.

short_description: SlimeSlider is a puzzle game about navigating levels by pushing boxes. In each level, you must push boxes in order to overcome (or take advantage of) your tendency to slide in order to direct the blob to the exit portal.
